form.label: Scheduler Assistant
form.searchTemplate: | rest "/servicesNS/-/-/admin/savedsearch/" search="is_scheduled=1" search="disabled=0" splunk_server=local [ | makeresults | eval earliest_time=relative_time(now(), "-0s@s") | return earliest_time ] [ | makeresults | eval latest_time=relative_time(now(), "$window$") | return latest_time ] | table splunk_server eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner cron_schedule title scheduled_times | mvexpand scheduled_times | rename scheduled_times as _time eai:acl.app as app eai:acl.owner as user title as search

single.searchString: index=_internal source=*splunkd.log Detected CPUs host=$host$| head 1 | rex "(?i)detected\s(?<cores>\d+)\s\(" | stats values(cores) as cores by host | outputlookup cores.csv | fields cores

single.searchPostProcess: | eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval weekday=strftime(_time, "%u") | eval bhours="$bhours$" | rex field=bhours "(?<bhour_start>\d+)-(?<bhour_end>\d+)" | stats count(eval(if(weekday<6 AND hour>=bhour_start AND hour<bhour_end,true(),''))) as foo

| eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval weekday=strftime(_time, "%u") | eval bhours="$bhours$" | rex field=bhours "(?<bhour_start>\d+)-(?<bhour_end>\d+)" | stats count(eval(if(weekday<6 AND hour>=bhour_start AND hour<bhour_end,false(),true()))) as foo

chart.title: Business Hours vs. Non-Business Hour Runs
chart.searchPostProcess: | eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval weekday=strftime(_time, "%u") | eval bhours="$bhours$" | rex field=bhours "(?<bhour_start>\d+)-(?<bhour_end>\d+)" | eval business_hour=if(weekday<6 AND hour>=bhour_start AND hour<bhour_end,"1","0") | timechart count(eval(if(business_hour==1,"1",''))) as BusinessHour, count(eval(if(business_hour==0,"1",''))) as Non-BusinessHour

chart.title: Anticipated Scheduled Searches Workload :: Top 10 Applications
chart.searchPostProcess: | timechart span=1h count by app limit=10

chart.title: Anticipated Scheduled Searches Workload :: Top 10 Users
chart.searchPostProcess: | timechart span=1h count by user limit=10

table.title: Most Active Searches - Top 10
table.searchPostProcess: | stats count(search) as count by search cron_schedule | sort 10 -count

table.title: Most Co-Occuring Searches - Top 10
table.searchPostProcess: | stats count list(search) as searches list(cron_schedule) as cron by _time | where mvcount(searches)>1 | eval searches=mvjoin(searches," | ") | eval cron=mvjoin(cron," | ") | stats count as Co-Occurences by searches cron | sort 10 -Co-Occurences | makemv delim="|" searches | makemv delim="|" cron | eventstats sum(Co-Occurences) as sum | eval percent=100*'Co-Occurences'/sum | fields - sum

table.title: Scheduled Searches Calendar - Number of Runs Business (B) vs. Non-Business (NB)
table.searchPostProcess: | eval day=strftime(_time, "%F") | eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval weekday=strftime(_time, "%u") | eval bhours="$bhours$" | rex field=bhours "(?<bhour_start>\d+)-(?<bhour_end>\d+)" | eval business=if(weekday<6 AND hour>=bhour_start AND hour<bhour_end,"B","NB") | stats count by search day business | eval combo=count.":".business | chart list(combo) over search by day
